grade_boundaries.threshold: Exemplary work with complete grasp of knowledge, understanding, and skills; all learning outcomes satisfied; compelling evaluation, originality, and elegance of argument.
Excellent work with comprehensive knowledge and skills; all learning outcomes satisfied; excellent evaluation and elegance of argument.
High standard work with comprehensive knowledge and skills; all learning outcomes satisfied; high standard of evaluation and argument.
Directly relevant to assessment requirements; substantial knowledge; comprehensive analysis; well-supported argument; distinctive thinking.
Addresses assessment requirements; adequate knowledge; significant analytical treatment; coherent and logically structured.
Some correlation with assessment requirements; basic understanding; some analytical treatment; coherent argument.
Intermittent relevance; limited understanding; largely descriptive or narrative; basic argument evident.
Insufficient evidence of knowledge, understanding, and skills; some learning outcomes satisfied; weak in several indicators.
Unacceptable work with little evidence of knowledge; few learning outcomes satisfied; weak in several indicators.
Almost no evidence of knowledge, understanding, and skills; fails to satisfy learning outcomes; weak in majority or all indicators.
